title: How to load JSON file data
content:
• make json file (you can see it on 'models' directory for content or menu file.)
  • define json file example: #routes/index/js - 'menus' value.
  • send the value on routes
  • use it on your view example: #views/index/index.hbs or #views/index/json.hbs
title_implementation: data on dashboard page using json file from #models/menu.json

title: How to load spesific JSON file data
content:
• open example code on #routes/index.js/routes for 'json_detail'
  • it's define an 'content' value example that find a data from json
title_implementation: data on this page get from #models/content.json

title: How to using POST
content:
• open example code on #routes/form.js/routes for '/'
  • there's two routes for '/', it use 'get' and 'post'
  • see the different on how the routes define data and the view show the data from the POST submit data
title_implementation: check on #routes/form.js to see the code
